t:
After my seven year old daughter's routine check-up, the doctor gave her a chocolate.



Then he pulled me aside and whispered,


           “She has chlamydia.”
c:
Chlamydia is a common, sexually transmitted infection that may not cause symptoms. It affects people of all ages but is most common in young women.



#disease #check #doctor #sexualabuse #pedophile #innocence #daughter #childsexualabuse
